dedicatedStyleForWidget.name: Dedicated style for for widget
dedicatedStyleForWidget.description: Dedicated style for for widget - {selected_option}-{widgetType}.css will be loaded

labelValue.name: Header
labelValue.description: empty field = dynamic header from page source

listElementsImageSize.name: List elements image resolution
listElementsImageSize.description: empty = original, works with images from Ring CMS

preloadImagesCount.name: Number of images that would be preloaded
preloadImagesCount.description: The number should correspond to the number of pictures the user sees first after entering the page

mobilePreloadImagesCount.name: Number of images that would be preloaded on mobile
mobilePreloadImagesCount.description: The number should correspond to the number of pictures the user sees first after entering the page

titleExtrasCodeNames.name: Title extras code names to show

alternativeTeasersCodeNames.name: Alternative teasers code names to show

selector.name: Query selector
selector.description: Query selector to fetch element e.g. div.myElement. When blockName is set it does not work

showOptions.name: Item elements to display
showOptions.description: (whether to display the property or not)

imageSizeMobile.name: Mobile image resolution
imageSizeMobile.description: Image resolution (empty = same as desktop), example: 600x330

textColor.name: Menu elements - custom color (name or HEX)
textColor.description: Menu elements - custom color (name or HEX)

standardImageWidth.name: Max image width
standardImageWidth.description: Maximum image width in px (empty = original)

standardImageHeight.name: Max image height
standardImageHeight.description: Maximum image height in px (empty = original)

extensionAppCodeName.name: Extension app code name
extensionAppCodeName.description: Extension app code name configured in settings of Story Editor

liveBlogId.name: liveBlog ID
liveBlogId.description: Provide it to render particular LiveBlog instead of connected with Story
